list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a coherent, typically large body of matter with no definite shape.
a large number of people or objects crowded together.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một khối người đi xe đạp

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the great mass of the population had little interest in the project
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khối lượng lớn của dân số ít quan tâm đến dự án

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the quantity of matter which a body contains, as measured by its acceleration under a given force or by the force exerted on it by a gravitational field.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đối tượng Stellar của khối lượng trung gian

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the Christian Eucharist or Holy Communion, especially in the Roman Catholic Church.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã đi đến hàng loạt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: relating to, done by, or affecting large numbers of people or things.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bộ phim có sự hấp dẫn hàng loạt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: assemble or cause to assemble into a mass or as one body.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: both countries began massing troops in the region
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cả hai nước bắt đầu massing quân đội trong khu vực
